Content: Crashes after update Great app overall, but there are so improvements to be made: -Removing "dots" faster, if you're clearing out a "directory" for example -Shared notes, for example shopping list

Great Start !
Using for a few days now and love this app. Very simple, easy to use and exactly what I've been looking for in an electronic note taker. Desk top app is really nice. Same issues here on the mobile app. It crashes almost every time you hit the back button. Get this fixed and i will probably purchase the paid version.
Buggy So glad to have an official app. But I can't figure out how to mark things complete and the app crashes often.
Didn't like it. Have to sign up to yet another cloud service, crashes a lot, limited functionality. Pass.
Some bugs and missing features Pressing the back button causes the app to crash. Additionally, missing options such as being able to change the background (white text on black).
Search crashes the app Laggy and non functional for me.
No use whatsoever Won't close, crashes and not intelligent. Far too basic to be of any use. Will be sticking with the alternatives.

Had to uninstall I *love* Workflowy, but the Android app is really lousy - have to tap 3 times to bring up the keyboard, can't drag up or down, and when you scroll, items get grabbed unintentionally and then the app freezes for a few seconds. Really annoying.
